topic: Comparative analysis of bimetallic catalysts' performance, mechanisms, and characteristics in CO2-ODH and DRP reactions with propane: An experimental and theoretical study focusing on Fe3Ni1/CeO2 and Ni3Pt1/CeO2
QuestionEnglish: How do the bimetallic catalysts Fe3Ni1/CeO2 and Ni3Pt1/CeO2 compare in terms of their composition, selectivity, stability, and reaction mechanisms in CO2-ODH and DRP reactions with propane, and what insights can be gained from experimental and theoretical (DFT) studies regarding their performance, synergistic effects, and potential for environmentally benign catalysis in the context of global alkene production and CO2 emissions reduction?
QuestionChinese: Fe3Ni1/CeO2和Ni3Pt1/CeO2这两种双金属催化剂在丙烷的CO2氧化脱氢（CO2-ODH）和干重整（DRP）反应中，在组成、选择性、稳定性和反应机理方面如何比较，从实验和理论（DFT）研究中可以获得哪些关于它们的性能、协同效应以及在全球烯烃生产和CO2减排背景下作为环境友好催化剂的潜力的见解？
